mapper.select: SELECT u.iuser,u.iauth, a.auth, u.upw, u.uid, firebase_token AS firebaseToken FROM user u JOIN auth a ON a.iauth = u.iauth WHERE u.uid = #{uid}
mapper.update: update user set firebase_token = #{firebaseToken} where iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.select: select P.iproduct, U.iuser, P.istatus as pistatus, PS.istatus from product P join user U on P.iuser = U.iuser and P.istatus IN (-1, -2) left join product_payment PP on PP.iproduct = P.iproduct left join payment PA on PA.ipayment = PP.ipayment left join payment_status PS on PA.ipayment = PS.ipayment and (P.iuser = 1 or PA.ibuyer = 1) where P.iuser = #{iuser} or PA.ibuyer = #{iuser} and PS.istatus IN (1, -1, -3)
select count(ichat) from chat_user where iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.delete: delete from chat_user where iuser = #{iuser} and istatus = -1
mapper.select: SELECT count(P.iproduct) FROM product P left JOIN product_payment PP ON P.iproduct = PP.iproduct left JOIN payment PA ON PP.ipayment = PA.ipayment left join payment_status PS on PA.ipayment = PS.ipayment WHERE P.istatus not IN (-1, -2) AND P.iuser = #{iuser} OR PA.ibuyer = #{iuser} and PS.istatus not IN (1, -1, -3)
SELECT comp_code as compCode, comp_nm as compNm FROM comp_info WHERE iuser = #{iuser}
